title: Karamata's theorem for regularised Cauchy transforms
abstract: We prove Abelian and Tauberian theorems for regularised Cauchy transforms of positive Borel measures on the real line whose distribution functions grow at most polynomially at infinity. In particular, we relate the asymptotics of the distribution functions to the asymptotics of the regularised Cauchy transform.
journal_ref: Proc. Roy. Soc. Edinburgh Sect. A 155 (2025), 1431-1491
